    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static <K, V> String
    averageGrouped(String database, String table, String averageField, String groupField, Map<K,V> whereKeysValues)
    SELECT groupField, AVG(averageField) FROM table WHERE (k1=@k1 AND k2=@k2) GROUP BY groupField
    static String
    averageGroupedBetween(String database, String table, String averageField, String groupField, String intervalField, String intervalFrom, String intervalTo)
    SELECT groupField, AVG(averageField) FROM table WHERE (interval BETWEEN intervalFrom AND intervalTo) GROUP BY groupField
    static <K, V> String
    countGrouped(String database, String table, String countField, Map<K,V> whereKeysValues)
    SELECT countField, COUNT(*) FROM table GROUP BY countField
    static String
    countGroupedBetween(String database, String table, String countField, String intervalField, String intervalFrom, String intervalTo)
    SELECT countField, COUNT(countField) FROM database.table WHERE (intervalField BETWEEN intervalFrom AND intervalTo) GROUP BY countField
    static <K, V> String
    select(String database, String table, List<String> selectKeys, Map<K,V> whereKeysValues)
    SELECT f1, f2 FROM table WHERE (w1=@w1 AND w2=@w2)
    static <K, V> String
    sumGrouped(String database, String table, String sumField, String groupField, Map<K,V> whereKeysValues)
    SELECT groupField, SUM(sumField) FROM table WHERE (k1=@k1 AND k2=@k2) GROUP BY groupField
    static String
    sumGroupedBetween(String database, String table, String sumField, String groupField, String intervalField, String intervalFrom, String intervalTo)
    SELECT groupField, SUM(sumField) FROM table WHERE (intervalField BETWEEN intervalFrom AND intervalTo) GROUP BY groupField
